website_summaries.verdict: Compact and waterproof, but there are other models with similar features that cost less.
pros: Battery life can last for several days
Compact and easy to carry at 4 oz
It's waterproof and comes with an attachment clip and charging dock
cons: It's expensive, but owners often comment that it's the best flashlight they've ever used

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to become a flashlight hoarderer. I think my wife believes I'm losing it but at least I'm not going to lose it in pitch darkness. This is a solid and compact flashlight. It's easy to use and doesn't require a Phd in thermodynamics to operate and change modes. It's very tank like to hold and feel. And I love the wireless charging. The magnetic end is very useful when you need to fasten it to something metal. Definitely one of my top 3 flashlight that my wife knows about. Lol. If you are reading this honey, I love you.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great little flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is a beautiful well made and powerful, size is good, perfect for your pocket. Now, the holster, I don’t know how to use it, it’s way too big, if you put the light all the way in it you are going to have hard time trying to take it out (I added a picture), unless you keep your light half way in it, but for me that’s not a reason to say something wrong about the flashlight, I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son, brother, and husband all have this light and I've admired it all along. I am now the recipient of one, I received it for my birthday. I can't tell you how thrilled I am. I carry it in my purse or while on shift, in my pocket. It's a fabulous, easy to use, lightweight flashlight. Super bright when needed or just the perfect amount. It charges easily and speaking of charging... I was concerned about waiting until the battery drained to re-charge. I researched this topic and found that I should just keep it "topped off". The batteries are reasonable to replace when needed. Buy this, you'll love it as I do. Thank you, Olight!
customer_reviews.author: aim

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright, convenient EDC
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! Charging is super easy. Battery life is more than adequate. I love the spread of the beam. Super compact. The user interface is very simple. The moonlight mode is nice while camping. Helps me find the light in the dark, as I can just leave it on.
customer_reviews.author: ereksonj

customer_reviews.title: Battery completely failed after 23 months of minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flashlight less than two years ago and used it very minimally. Maybe two times per month. Recently the battery has completely failed and will not hold a charge for even five minutes. I contacted olight support who informed me that the battery is supposed to last 500 cycles but is out of warranty. I guarantee I have used 100 cycles of less. Olight will not replace the part and advises me to just buy a new one. For the high price tag I feel the battery should last more than 23 months especially considering I have used it only 50 to 100 cycles, much less than the described 500 cycle life span. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Button reference location
customer_reviews.text: Design is my thing. 40+ yrs product.Great lil flashlight , recharge stand is nice. My only prob is button location. had to set up clip hold so that i would have tactical reference, if this makes sense you know...
customer_reviews.author: Slinut60

customer_reviews.title: A perfect everyday flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight. It is a perfect size and is really bright on the high setting. I like it enough that I have bought some more as Christmas presents. It is not a tactical flashlight, meaning no tail switch. Just a great small pocketable flashlight that stays charged.
customer_reviews.author: John C Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great compact flash light
customer_reviews.text: My husbands job requires him to have a very bright flash light that is compact to have on him all the time and still be able to work on the machines he does, and this is the best flash light we have bought yet! And trust me this thing is durable! It has been dropped so many times and has lasted through it all.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and technologically superior in every way
customer_reviews.text: Strong gift potential. I have purchased 3, one to each of my brothers, 1 first to myself. They are in awe of my superior judgement & advanced thinking. Guaranteed praise...even if you brother owns a TESLA, as mine does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best
customer_reviews.text: Look no further! These are the best lights your hard earned money can buy. The battery life is insane! They are friggin waterproof, easy to charge, easy to carry, so bright, and just plain proof that USA made stuff is the best. I buy them for anyone who needs a gift. Their customer service is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Schuylor Dee Hayley

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one as a give but can attest to the good quality, great lighting
customer_reviews.text: I own several Olight flashlights (Thanks to my buddy Sootch00 on YouTube). I bought this one as a give but can attest to the good quality, great lighting, features and durability of these lights. There are many style and models but I think this one here is just about right. Grab one... or two!
customer_reviews.author: Horse-N-Round

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, high quality, and well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically designed, high quality flashlight. Turbo mode is extremely bright and there's plenty of other brightness modes to suit any particular purpose. This flashlight is a small form factor as well, so this is as EDC friendly as you can get in a flashlight, as far as I'm concerned. The awesome charging dock, included battery and included carrying case just make the deal that much sweeter.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Less than a month, stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on May 23 2018. The on/off button has already began to fail. Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Trammel

customer_reviews.title: Another great EDC light from Olight!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Olight flashlight I have purchased and I love each one of them. I actually prefer the earlier model over the newest one because I like to carry my lights bezel down and for some crazy reason Olight took that option away in the new model. That's why it got 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: As always olight puts out a great product. This one does not disappoint. only thing that I didn't like about this package was the case that came with the bundle. Way too long and velcro is about 3 in Long very noisy. But I would recommend this flashlight to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Boone

customer_reviews.title: Solid investment with thoughtful features
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but decided to take the plunge. Haven't used it much yet but love the nonroll, brightness, stand-up magnetic recharge, and small easy feel in handhold. Feels like a great step up for my back-packing and camping!
customer_reviews.author: dhowerton

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I don’t honestly know where to start. I was working on my truck late night and forgot to take this off the inside of the fender well. I drove to work the next morning about 30 minutes away, left and went to the gym after work then back home. After all this my light was still attached to the inside of the fender well. Would highly rwcommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Allen

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this flashlight is the charger. It is magnetic. The light is so so. Battery life seems to be ok. Feels durable and solid. But working with cars, I need a bright light to see when underneath. This isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: sds

customer_reviews.title: Great light/bad switch
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this light for duty use for about a year and 3 months. The light held up well but the charging dock went out on me within a few weeks forcing me to buy a new charging cable. Heavy and daily use of this light has finally caused the switch to malfunction and stop working. I just think they need a tougher switch. But the LED, Glass, water resistance and body are all working perfectly. I’ll be contact olight to see if I can get the switch replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: So bright and rechargeable! The thing is really bright on high and can reach out on turbo. I’m a flashlight guy and this is one of my go to lights. It’s brighter than my 6D mag light.
customer_reviews.author: Dana J. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Red / Green
customer_reviews.text: Have it a 3 because when it’s on the base whether it’s full charge or not. Depending on how it’s placed on the base you get red and green. Meaning charged or charging so you never really know where your at with batt life.
customer_reviews.author: mik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific flashlight! I have another Olight and love it too.....but it’s highest output is 550 lumens. So that one goes to my wife and the new one is MINE. These lights are perfect for evening walks as we try to look for Florida wildlife.it is easy to charge, easy to operate...and holds a charge well.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. Its part of my edc. I use it for work daily. Solid construction. The clip is very strong. It has never fallen out of my pocket when I’m running. Small but not too small. I love that it’s rechargeable so I don’t have to replace batteries every couple of weeks. I can also go about 2-4 days sometimes without recharging even with daily use. This is 100% worth money. If you wanna invest in a good flashlight with adjustable Lumens I highly recommend it. I love Olight they are a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good Light, BAD HOLSTER
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight works well, but I can't say the same for the holster it came with from LumenTac. I first thought the wrong holster was sent with the package and contacted the seller to confirm. I heard back from Lumen Tactical (The seller), and they're claiming the holster is the correct one for this light. The holster is too long and it's way to cumbersome to fish the light out its holster everytime I need it. I'll let everyone else who reads this review be the judge of whether it's the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: willie

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, compact, carry-able. Seems to be a quality item. Quite bright, holds a charge well so far. All in all I like it. Bought this light after experience with the Olight mini weapon mount light with which I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cullen

customer_reviews.title: absolutely obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This is the best light ever! the battery lasts for what seems to be an eternity the magnet on the back is powerful and its bright as hell! i would recommend this to anyone looking for the end all of flashlights!
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Olight
customer_reviews.text: I carry this flashlight with me every day. The 4 different light settings are awesome. I comes in handy all the time. The strobe effect is incredibly effective and disorienting. The charge holds for months and the charging dock is really nice. I absolutely reccomend this Olight flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Whoa
customer_reviews.text: This relatively tiny flashlight packs a punch. Amazing brightness. No more finding out your batteries are running low. It's expensive, but treat yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Readie

customer_reviews.title: I can't think of a flashlight I've ever liked more than this one
customer_reviews.text: I can't think of a flashlight I've ever liked more than this one. The only problem I've had with it is when I didn't lock out the button and it turned on in the case on my belt while I was sitting down. It gets very hot on turbo without ventilation, apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic light pair this up with a fenix headlamp strap and you've got a perfect headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: Ache

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda expensive for such a small flashlight, but I've had it for a couple of months, love it, and use it all the time. It's great having a flashlight always charged and ready to go next to the door.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: It can take a long time to charge
customer_reviews.text: Bright compact flashlight. Bought one for my 82 year old Grandpa to help him see items and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: This light is extremely bright. The con isn’t magnet charging station makes charging it very simple. I would recommend this light to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice lite ,well made, good deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice flashlight, durable, bright well made. Seal on box(as with all olights, unless used). Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlight I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best flashlight I've ever used, and I'm a contractor that uses it daily. Only slight problem is you can tell the case that comes with it isn't exactly made for it. The velcro flap doesn't line up quite right.
customer_reviews.author: Stu M.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, portable and appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: Great light, bright, portable, charges fast and appears to be well made and durable. Time will tell on the last point on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Badia

customer_reviews.title: Not the brightest in the bunch
customer_reviews.text: Could be a lot brighter for the $$$$. Battery drained quickly
customer_reviews.author: Chance favors the prepared mind

customer_reviews.title: Great light and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Arrived as described and on time. Simple to use, very small and very bright. Charges quickly and magnetic charger is a handy storage place. Would buy again and use this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: A Good Light ,but.
customer_reviews.text: A good light. My only problem with it is I sometimes have to loosen and tighten the bottom cap to get it to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: What a great fladhlight! It lights up the night as bright as day. It's so bright, I must be careful not to point it at our neighbors windows!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Binford

customer_reviews.title: CAN BEAT THIS LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: A marvelous little flashlight that has a powerful beam - unbelievably powerful for the size!. I carry it with me everywhere I go. Charging system is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't needed charged in 6 weeks, takes rough handling well too!
customer_reviews.text: I received this mid December for an early Christmas present. It is now Feb 5th and I've yet to charge the flashlight. Looking to pick up more Olight products honestly- this is a good buy. Already saved in batteries what other flashlights might have cost outright.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Raduenz

customer_reviews.title: It died after not even 2 months for no reason ...
customer_reviews.text: It died after not even 2 months for no reason. The battery can use for the other flashlight but the flashlight and the charger won't work.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright - a little long
customer_reviews.text: bought for my husband. A little larger (longer) than he wanted but he liked the amount of light it puts out. This is about the 5th olight he has. He loves a flashlight!

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked on Olight
customer_reviews.text: Amazing light. I spent months watching reviews on YouTube and I'm not disappointed with this light. I love that it recharges with a magnetic base. This light has come in very handy at work already. Any of the Olight series will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Quinones

customer_reviews.title: I love flashlights I have a lot of them I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I love flashlights I have a lot of them I keep buying cheap lights because I lose or break them at work so far I love my s30 it's bright small and rechargeable. So far I love it I hope I don't have to but I will buy it again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: No disappointments.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, which is great. Battery life is insane considering output. Has gotten wet, sat in a pile of melting ice from a small waterfall, been dropped onto rock plenty. Still works great. No weird switch glitches. Just works.

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a super bright light to get around inside of dark aircraft spaces. This does a fantastic job! I'm very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. very small and bright. like the way it charges.

customer_reviews.title: Small and Bright
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small but bright flashlight, and this fit the bill. Working great so far, I'll update the review if anything changes.

customer_reviews.title: Another awesome light
customer_reviews.text: Super light. Easy charging. Great car light. Easy clip to use amny ways. Love Olight.

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable is a nice feature. I have owned this flashlight through model ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful light, for the size. Rechargeable is a nice feature. I have owned this flashlight through model updates over the years, and would justify spending the money. Out of 7 lights in the past 4 years, only one of them had a switch issue. The problem is losing a few of them.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The case that this comes with seems like it's way too big for the flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The case that this comes with seems like it's way too big for the flashlight, but the flashlight itself is excellent; incredibly bright, lasts a good while before needing to charge. I'd recommend it for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I use the light every night in the winter on my farm. I have had the light for almost 3 years. I charge it every 3 weeks in the winter and in the summer every 2 months. Reliable light. If it acts up I removed and reinstall the battery. I have only had to do this 3 times.

customer_reviews.text: Very bright and does the job! It has 3 settings of light! The light does get hot after use of 3 minutes or so but overall, it's a great flash light for camping, shooting, etc! I'd buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best small flashlight ever made
customer_reviews.text: I own a bunch of higher end flashlights. I own Fenixes and Thrunites. This Olight S30R has bested them all. Nearly perfect combination of features and performance. Loved ability to override the memorized mode and start from firefly. Loved the button functions. Loved size, form, finishing and performance. Loved flood to reach out compromise. Loved external charger. It is nearly perfect flashlight. Here are few things left to make it really ultimate - Olight, please 1) make the battery last for ever and 2) add a deem red light mode. Everything else is great. This is perhaps one of the best small flashlights ever made. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfied

customer_reviews.title: This has become my go-to light. Everything from camping ...

Everything from camping, around the house, and evening walks, to carrying IWB with the standard deep carry clip to use a self defense/deterrent, this light has it all. The feature of recharging without unscrewing and removing batteries is a simple aspect of this light that sets it a pace higher than comparable lights (I personally compared to Fenix PD35).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good edc light.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get a 5 because you have to buy the " custom" batteries for it. Performance wise, it's a ton of light for such a small EDC light. All of my co workers want it. Suddenly, theirs look weak in comparison <g>

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased.

customer_reviews.text: Great flashlight would have given it 5 stars but the button that switches through the modes isn't very well pronounced

customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: Olight S30R III 1050 Lumens EDC LED Rechargeable Flashlight with Magnetic Charging Dock and LumenTac Premium Holster
product_meta.description:
The Olight S30R III is the latest S30R from Olight and it's brighter and more compact than ever! Powered by a CREE XM-L2 LED, it reaches 1050 lumens at the highest setting and now it's even smaller, measuring just 4.49 inches long and weighing less than 4oz. This small flashlight is rechargeable with an included charging dock and a high capacity 3500mAh customized battery. The included clip, lanyard, and magnetic tailcap offer impressive versatility, allowing you to clip, loop, or attach the light to a wide variety of surfaces. The light makes a great companion at work or in the outdoors camping or hiking. 

Note: The light will only work with the included customized battery.

Specifications:
* LED: Cree XM-L2
* Battery run time:
--- 1050~500 lumens - 2 + 200 min
--- 500 lumens - 210 min
--- 120 lumens - 15 hr
--- 12 lumens - 130 hr
--- 0.5 lumens - 100 days
* Beam distance: 205 yards / 188m
* Beam intensity: 8,840 cd
* Battery: Customized 3500mAh rechargeable battery (included)
* Dimensions: Body: 4.49 in (114mm) x 0.98 in (25mm)
* Weight: 3.88 oz (11g) (w/ battery)
* Waterproof: IPX8 (2m)

Features:
* Utilizes a smooth aluminum reflector which provides an improved beam focus for medium and close-range illumination, paired with a hardened glass lens that is coated allowing for a 99% light transmission rate.
* Has a charging port compatible with Olight magnetic charging cables (sold separately)
* Low power indicator under the side switch. When the battery voltage is running low (below 3.1V), it will glow red.
* Thermal management program protects user's' hands and flashlight from heat. Turbo mode stays on for 2 min. before stepping down to high mode within 1 min.
* Direct access to turbo mode: when the flashlight is not under lockout mode, double click to activate the turbo mode.
* Timer function: long timer (9 min) and short timer (3 min).
feature_bullets: BRIGHTER THAN EVER - Offers a powerful maximum output of 1050 lumens. Upgraded from Olight s30R Baton II, this third generation Olight S30R Baton III comes with a Cree XM-L2 LED.

NOW EVEN SMALLER - Measures a mere 4.49 inches long and weighs under 4 ounces after battery installation, making it a great light for everyday carry. 3mm shorter for the previous Olight S30R Baton II.

MAGNETIC CHARGING DOCK - Equipped with customized high capactiy 3500mAh Customized battery plus a desktop magnetic USB charging dock, offering fast, easy plug-free charging securely held to any smooth surface by three suction cups, and is also compatible with Olight's MCC charger (sold separately)

INCREDIBLY VERSATILE - Comes with a sturdy clip to easily attach to a bag strap, belt, or hat, plus comes equipped with a strong magnetic tailcap to attach to metal surfaces, offering convenient hands-free usage options wherever you are

COMPLETE SOLUTION - Includes a customized rechargeable battery, USB charging dock, USB cable, lanyard and clip for convenient charging and carry as well as a LumenTac flashlight holster to easily protect and carry your light
